long_description: These casual Mini Fairisle socks for sandal-wearing Saturdays supply well-known SmartWool(R) performance to keep your feet dry and comfortable. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon and a touch of elastic for a reliably good fit and casual appearance. Soft comfort cuff doesn't bind yet offers stay-up power. Tapered, flat-looped toe box provides a smooth fit with no irritation. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These casual Mini Fairisle socks for sandal-wearing Saturdays supply well-known SmartWool(R) performance to keep your feet dry and comfortable.
